v1: All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All my thoughts and words and doings,
All my days and all my hours.
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All my days and all my hours,
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All my days and all my hours.
v2: Let my hands perform His bidding;
Let my feet run in His ways;
Let mine eyes see Jesus only;
Let my lips speak forth His praise.
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
Let my lips speak forth His praise,
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
Let my lips speak forth His praise.
v3: Worldlings prize their gems of beauty,
Cling to guilded toys of dust;
Boast of wealth, and fame, and pleasure;
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
v4: Since my eyes were fixed on Jesus,
I've lost sight of all beside—
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
v5: Deigns to call me His beloved,
Lets me rest beneath His wings.
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
All for Jesus! All for Jesus!
